duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead electrical issue identification and resolution for all electrical features on a program line to ensure successful vehicle launch.
Rapid troubleshooting / triage of vehicle electrical systems including wiring issues, electrical component issues, assembly plant issues, and vehicle networking issues.
Support vehicle launches, durability fleets, and prototype vehicles.
Collaborate with various Engineering Support teams, Program Management, and Manufacturing teams as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science
